column2: "I got your data! Great work, killer! For real, I could barely follow what you were doin'..."
"Watchin' you take on all those guys at once without even breakin' a sweat gave me serious chills..."
"...Yeah, I'd say you're the scariest thing on the battlefield by a mile. Not plannin' on switchin' sides, are ya...?"
"Ah, jokin' aside, I think I can use this to figure out how I can fight 'em. I'll be kickin' glowbot butt in no time!"
